scripts.build: echo 'ðŸš€ Cloudflare Workers build...' && cp next.config.pages.mjs next.config.mjs && NODE_ENV=production next build && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && echo 'âœ… Workers build completed!'
scripts.build:minimal: echo 'ðŸš€ Minimal build mode...' && cp next.config.minimal.mjs next.config.mjs && NODE_ENV=production next build && echo 'âœ… Minimal build completed!'
scripts.build:turbo: echo 'âš¡ Turbo build mode...' && cp next.config.fast.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && echo 'âœ… Turbo build completed!'
scripts.build:fast: echo 'ðŸš€ Fast build (keep cache)...' && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_WEBPACK_CACHE=false next build && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && echo 'âœ… Fast build completed!'
scripts.build:cf: pnpm clean && rm -rf cache && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && rm -rf .open-next/assets/cache && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs && echo 'OpenNext Cloudflare build completed!'
scripts.build:clean: pnpm clean && rm -rf cache && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && rm -rf .open-next/assets/cache && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs && echo 'Clean build completed!'
scripts.build:cf-workers: pnpm clean && rm -rf cache && cp wrangler.toml wrangler.toml.backup && cp wrangler.workers.toml wrangler.toml && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && rm -rf .open-next/assets/cache && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs && mv wrangler.toml.backup wrangler.toml && echo 'OpenNext Workers build completed!'
scripts.build:cf-pages: pnpm clean && rm -rf cache && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_WEBPACK_CACHE=true next build && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs && echo 'Pages build completed! Output in .next/'
scripts.build:static: pnpm clean && rm -rf cache && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.simple.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs && echo 'Static export completed! Output in out/'
scripts.build:cf-static: node scripts/remove-api-routes.js && pnpm clean && next build
scripts.build:opennext: pnpm clean && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && npx @opennextjs/aws build && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs
scripts.build:workers: pnpm clean && cp next.config.mjs next.config.mjs.backup && cp next.config.opennext.mjs next.config.mjs && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && mv next.config.mjs.backup next.config.mjs && echo 'Cloudflare Workers build completed!'
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next out cache .open-next && echo 'Cleaned build directories' || echo 'Clean completed'
scripts.deploy:clean: pnpm upload:r2 && pnpm clean:static --force && pnpm build:cf
scripts.deploy:preview: pnpm build:cf && echo 'Ready for Cloudflare Pages deployment'
scripts.git:commit: sh -c 'COMMIT_MSG="$1"; git add . && git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" && ts-node scripts/update-technical-changelog.ts --contentFile scripts/.tmp_changelog_content.md' --
scripts.git:commit:push: sh -c 'COMMIT_MSG="$1"; git add . && git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" && ts-node scripts/update-technical-changelog.ts --contentFile scripts/.tmp_changelog_content.md --perform-amend && git push' --
